Html:
I'm not familiar with the event limitations for the tablet application.

Please explain what the limitation is.

Cheers!

Hi.

As far as I remember, (I may be very wrong though)
  1. customization is limited for tablet app even close to none
  2. iFrame, WebResource will not be displayed in tablet apps
  3. Integrations will not work (yammer, activity feeds, bing map, sharepoint document)
  4. Cannot switch forms
  5. onLoad method is the only method will be triggered
  6. When tablet app goes offline, data will be read-only. form events will not work.
  7. wildcard search will not work for tablet app
Maybe more and will have changes in the latest RU1. I will need to put some readings there about tablet application part.

Hope this helps.

Regards,
Jaimie

Hi Jaimie,

To your bullet #5, using an iPad, I was able to get a field on-change event to execute custom java-script.

Thanks,
Mark
